name: Grand Spider Hero: City War
description:
Enjoy your favorite Super Spider Hero game.
With the all new great Powers.

It will surprise you this time!

Features:

DIfferent SHOPS with a lot of guns to buy.

Explore the Miami Grand city while driving superbikes and drifting cars.

high quality animations.

Huge variety of guns to buy.

Fast Run like lighting speed

flying powers & much more
